message: I think a fair starting point is for me to get 90% and you to get 10%. I'm sure we can work something out that benefits us both.
Alice, your offer was quite lopsided. Let's be more realistic. How about a 70/30 split?  Remember, the value of the money decreases for both of us with each round.

I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need a better deal than that.  Let's split it 60/40 this time. Remember, the value of the money is decreasing for me with each round, so I need to make sure I get a good share.
Alice, time is running out, and the value is slipping away with each round. I'm offering you a 40/60 split.  Let's settle this now and both walk away with something substantial.
